sense.gloss: surrender (to the authorities), giving oneself up, turning oneself in

sdata.j: その↑犯人↑↓はんにん↓は↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓に|↑自首|↑↓じしゅ↓した。
sdata.e: The criminal gave himself up to the police.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑説得↑↓せっとく↓して↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓に|↑自首|↑↓じしゅ↓させた。
sdata.e: I persuaded him to give himself up to the police.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓に|↑自首|↑↓じしゅ↓したそうです。
sdata.e: I heard that he gave himself up to the police.

sdata.j: ひき↑逃↑↓に↓げの↑犯人↑↓はんにん↓は↑翌日↑↓よくじつ↓↑父親↑↓ちちおや↓に↑伴↑↓ともな↓われて|↑自首|↑↓じしゅ↓してきました。
sdata.e: The hit-and-run driver, accompanied by his father, came and turned himself in the next day.
